testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as investigator and on transaction list view

steps.step: Click the filter icon on the Amount column
steps.expectedResult: Filter options for Amount column are displayed

steps.step: Set filter to show amounts greater than $1000
steps.expectedResult: Filter is applied and only transactions > $1000 are displayed
Total number of displayed transactions is updated to reflect filtered results

testCases.postconditions: Transaction list shows only filtered results

testCases.summary: Verify applying multiple column filters simultaneously
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as investigator and on transaction list view

steps.expectedResult: List shows only transactions with amounts > $500

steps.step: Apply Date filter for last week's transactions
steps.expectedResult: List shows only transactions from last week that are also > $500
Both Amount and Date columns show active filter indicators

testCases.postconditions: Transaction list shows results matching both filter criteria

testCases.summary: Verify sort functionality with active filters
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as investigator and has applied Amount filter

steps.step: Click Date column header to sort
steps.expectedResult: Filtered transactions are sorted by date
Amount filter remains active while sort is applied

testCases.postconditions: Filtered transactions remain sorted by date

testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as investigator and has multiple filters applied

steps.expectedResult: List updates to show transactions matching remaining filters

testCases.postconditions: Transaction list reflects removal of Amount filter only

testCases.summary: Verify filter interaction with transaction graph
testCases.preconditions: User is logged in as investigator and has applied column filters

steps.expectedResult: Graph displays in its original unfiltered state
Notification indicates filters only apply to list view

testCases.postconditions: Graph remains unaffected by list filters
